reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Stayed for family wedding in July. The location of the hotel is fantastic, short walk to everything in the old town, but nice and quiet courtyard a great way to escape the crowds. Room was small but had everything we needed, breakfasts in the old breakfast room and outside in the courtyard were a highlight of our stay. Would love to go back!
reviews.title: Great hotel in lovely Vilnius Old Town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013
reviews.text: Stayed 2 nights recently, well located in the city close to many attractions, restaurants, the best bars and nightclubs not too far away either.
reviews.title: Nice rooms, staff ok, breakfast poor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was nice enough, on arrival person on reception was ok but didn't really explain anything apart from where the breakfast was and what time, maybe they didn't speak very good English.
reviews.title: Charming - in the center - private sauna/banya

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was poor, some cheeses, bread, yogurt and fruit. For the hot food there was fatty bacon, overcooked scrambled egg and some ham and cheese parcels, I am not sure if this is some standard breakfast in Lithuania or that this hotel didn't offer much. Yes it was advertised as free breakfast but really you always pay for it in the price of the hotel booking.
reviews.title: Enjoyable stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool and sauna was something like 15 euros an hour which is ok for privste use but I wish they had clearly advertised the additional costs when booking, seems there are a lot of hotels not doing this and when I specificily book a hotel for the pool and then find out there are more costs its annoying.
reviews.title: Superior at everything!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here last week for 3 nights. The location was excellent, on the edge of old town and only a 2 or 3 minute walk to several shops, restaurants, bars, etc. Room was spacious. Bathroom was great...large with a tub and separate shower. The staff were friendly and helpful, especially the porter who delivered our luggage. Very good breakfast included in the price. The only issue we had was the transport to the airport which the hotel arranged for us. The hotel quoted us one amount which was reasonable, but upon dropping us off at the airport, the driver demanded more money. Unfortunately I didn't have much time to argue and had to pay. Partly my fault for not confirming the price upon entering the taxi. Overall, nice place and I would stay again.
reviews.title: Good Hotel with a Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in this hotel for three nights on a tour. Hotel room was a good size. We did not have any of the problems reported in other reviews. Former monastery converted to a hotel. Exterior not the greatest, but hotel was clean. Good breakfast buffet. Staff responded quickly and cheerfully to requests for extra pillows etc.
reviews.title: nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overpriced and cumbersome. This is not a 4 star hotel but at most a 3 star hotel. The location is good, the place is cute but...
reviews.title: Total Rip-off

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had to change our reservation and ended up paying 600 euros per ONE night! not only that, the room was on the third floor with no elevator, the stairs were tiny and we got an attic ceiling room where my husband could stand properly in half of the room or - READ THIS- in the shower. The shower has no curtain and faces the toilet so either you hold it or everything gets wet.
reviews.title: Not a 4 star hotel, it was ok

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband also had to tilt his head getting down the stairs. We left our luggage in the car and carry what we needed in a bag.
reviews.title: Weekend Visitors be warned

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had a great stay here recently in August. We were on the third floor, and although the hotel doesn't have a lift, there was a man who wisked our luggage up to our room. Tipping must not be common beause he ran off before I could! The roof was sloping thus limiting head room at one corner of the room but this was not a problem. Road noise was not a problem once the a/c was on. The bathroom was lovely and had a full sized bath. Having travelled around the baltics on this holiday, this hotel offered the best breakfast with loads of food for western tastes. The staff were very friendly and helpful. I had a late flight and they stored my luggage for me during the day and arranged a taxi for 30 Litas.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel near old town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: Overall a great experience. It has the feel of a country manor hotel but with the advantage of a central location.
reviews.title: Hidden gem in central Vilnius

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Stayed in the Mabre for three days of business.
reviews.title: calm,well located hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hotel is located in the heart of Vilnius (the old town), and right opposite the Uzupis area.
reviews.title: A Disappointing Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are spacious and comfortable. Beds are comfortable, and staff seem to be up to beat.
reviews.title: Fashionable stay in a historical building

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We had room 2011, which was across the courtyard from the reception. It was a standard 2 bedroom. The living area was about 180 SF, with a 120 SF bathroom, a very good size. The furniture was basic, well-kept, as was the room.
reviews.title: Good stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013
reviews.text: We have been in many hotels in Europe, and I always said that whoever designed the shower never took one in it. This bathroom had a separate bath and shower, which was the first intelligently designed one we have had, as it was able to close the door such that minimal water would get on the floor. It was easy to get in and out.
reviews.title: A lovely stay in a fantastic city

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: The hotel, or Residence, looked new and clean. Service was excellent. Our room was quiet.
reviews.title: Very good choice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: While it looked like it was out of town, it was easy walking to the center, with a good map and good planning.
reviews.title: Excellent !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We loved everything about Vilnius, the architecture, the weather, the people....and we had a great stay at Mabre Residence. The rooms were a great size, the staff very helpful, and the steak house attached to the hotel served fabulous steak. The pool is much smaller than it appears on the booking.com pictures, but on the plus side you get to rent it privately which was really fun. Location was perfect on the edge of the old town and we would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Great location and comfortable rooms, but do not expect any smiles or service!
